response.original_title: Getting Hit by Maturity in the Age of
response.overview: GETTING HIT BY MATURITY IN THE AGE OF #WHATTHEFUCKSHALLWEDOWITHOURLIVES deals with the issues of the so-called Millenials and their utter shock of suddenly having crossed the unofficial threshold to “real” adulthood, their 30th birthday. Moreover, the film tells about the feeling of a generation that is somehow lost in the middle between the baby boomers, most of whom are still traditionally entrenched, and the younger GenZ, who are taking to the streets again to save the world.
